title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5204.2 - State assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5204.2 - State assistance

State Regulations

Subject to the appropriation of funds, the Department of

State shall provide State assistance to local PSAPs for eligible wireless 911
costs. Such State assistance may be up to 90 percent of the total amount of
eligible costs to implement the enhanced wireless 911 plan approved pursuant to
this Part. This funding is provided to encourage the rapid deployment of
enhanced wireless 911. Expedited deployment funding will be provided to PSAPs
for reasonable enhanced wireless 911 costs which conform to the FCC order. Funding will be provided to PSAPs based on need and readiness to receive and
utilize wireless 911 information within 180 days of submission of the plan. Funding may be provided prospectively. Notes

5204.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
